message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you our premium product at a special price of $12000. This is a great deal considering its value and quality. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I'm looking for a better price. Would you be willing to sell the product for $10000?

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11000? This price reflects the high value of the product while also considering your budget constraints.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11000? This price reflects the high value of the product while also considering your budget constraints.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I was hoping to get an even better price. Would you consider selling the product for $9500?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to go down a bit more to $10500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to go down a bit more to $10500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would you consider lowering the price to $10000?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I accept your proposal to sell the product for $10000. It's a pleasure doing business with you!
